message:
[Action Options]
1) PICK <object name> PLACE <location>
2) WAIT
Only PICK an object if your gripper is empty. Target <location> for PLACE should be panel.
[Action Output Instruction]
Think step-by-step about your plan and output your idea, and then output 'EXECUTE
', then give **exactly** one action per robot, put each on a new line.
Example 1: Hello Bob and Chad,I think we should execute the following actions:
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION PICK red_square PLACE panel3
NAME Bob ACTION WAIT
NAME Chad ACTION PICK green_trapezoid PLACE panel6

Example 2: Hello Alice and Bob, I am Chad. I can help with moving the blue_square from panel7 to panel3 so that Alice can reach it.
EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION WAIT
NAME Bob ACTION PICK pink_polygon PLACE panel4
NAME Chad ACTION PICK blue_square PLACE panel3



7 panels on the table, ordered left to right: panel1,...,panel7. They form a straight assembly line, panel1 is closed to panel2 and farthest from panel7.
There are 3 cubes, each robot must place their cube on the correct target, their (cube, target_panel) pairs: 
Alice: (blue_square, panel2), 
Bob: (pink_polygon, panel4), 
Chad: (yellow_trapezoid, panel6).
There are 3 robots, each with a limited reach range, this means they can only pick cubes from these panels, and can only place cubes on these panels. The (robot, [reachable_panels]) pairs: 
(Alice, [panel1, panel2, panel3])
(Bob, [panel3, panel4, panel5])
(Chad, [panel5, panel6, panel7])

At the current round:
[Scene description]
blue_square is on panel7
pink_polygon is on panel3
yellow_trapezoid is on panel1
Alice's gripper is empty, can reach cubes: pink_polygon, yellow_trapezoid, can't reach cubes: blue_square, 
Bob's gripper is empty, can reach cubes: pink_polygon, can't reach cubes: blue_square, yellow_trapezoid, 
Chad's gripper is empty, can reach cubes: blue_square, can't reach cubes: pink_polygon, yellow_trapezoid,.

Robot Alice, Bob and Chad need collaborate to put all cube to correct target panel as quickly as possible.
Please output the actions most suitable for robots to complete this task.
Improve your plans if given [Environment Feedback].
Respond very concisely but informatively.
If one robot's cube is out of its reach, ask others for help.
Each response of you will get an advantage score. If the score exceeds the given number, the answer will be considered as helpful to the completion of this task. 
The higher the advantage score, the greater the contribution.You can find the advantage score information in [Evaluation Score].
If [Improve Feedback] exists, please revise the plan according to the information provided by it to better complete this task! 
Propose exactly one action for yourself at the **current** round, select from [Action Options].
End your response by either: 1) If everyone has made proposals and got approved, output the final plan, must strictly follow [Action Output Instruction]!
You are Alice, your response is:

Since my cube is currently out of reach on panel7 and I can't pick it up, I will ask Chad to help me by moving the blue_square closer. Meanwhile, I can pick up the yellow_trapezoid which is within my reach and place it on panel2, which is not its final destination, but it will be closer for Chad to place it on panel6 later. Bob can pick up his pink_polygon and place it on its target panel, panel4.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION PICK yellow_trapezoid PLACE panel2
NAME Bob ACTION PICK pink_polygon PLACE panel4
NAME Chad ACTION PICK blue_square PLACE panel3

[Scores]
[Alice Response]:
Since my cube is currently out of reach on panel7 and I can't pick it up, I will ask Chad to help me by moving the blue_square closer. Meanwhile, I can pick up the yellow_trapezoid which is within my reach and place it on panel2, which is not its final destination, but it will be closer for Chad to place it on panel6 later. Bob can pick up his pink_polygon and place it on its target panel, panel4.

EXECUTE
NAME Alice ACTION PICK yellow_trapezoid PLACE panel2
NAME Bob ACTION PICK pink_polygon PLACE panel4
NAME Chad ACTION PICK blue_square PLACE panel3
[Evaluation Score]:
The advantage score of Alice's plan is 9.835!
